name: The PocketRooms
description:
NOTE: YOU NEED TO MOVE FORWARD FOR A WHILE TO START PLAYING!

This game will also be on android.

One of the most popular horrors, made more simple! Can you escape the multiple levels of the PocketRooms(Top down backrooms), avoiding spooky enemies and trying to find a way out!

You see all those Backrooms games over there, well we are the middle child of backrooms games. We are not normal, we are simple and don't need to be on steam.
